NAME NAME, ho.pay_money payMoney, sdat.timeframe timeframe, sda.appointment_time appointmentTime FROM sec_reservation sr, his_order ho, sec_hospital sh, sec_doctor sd, sec_payment sp, sec_patient spt, sec_doctor_appointmenttime_timeframe sdat, sec_doctor_appointmenttime sda WHERE sr.order_id = ho.id AND sr.hospital_id = sh.id AND sd.id = sr.doctor_id AND sr.order_status = 0 AND ho.order_name = "预约挂号" AND sr.user_id = #{id} AND sp.patient_id = spt.id AND sp.order_id = ho.id AND spt.is_default = 0 and sr.timeframe_id=sdat.id and sda.id=sdat.appointmenttime_id
